scripts.deploy-product: dotenv -e .env cross-var "clasp push -f && clasp deploy --deploymentId $PRODUCTION_DEPLOYMENT_ID --description 本番環境"
scripts.deploy-dev01: dotenv -e .env cross-var "clasp push -f && clasp deploy --deploymentId $DEVELOPMENT01_DEPLOYMENT_ID --description 開発環境01"
scripts.deploy-dev02: dotenv -e .env cross-var "clasp push -f && clasp deploy --deploymentId $DEVELOPMENT02_DEPLOYMENT_ID --description 開発環境02"
